title: Aroha House Florence Luxe Armchair — Velvet Accent Chair with Wooden Frame for Homes, Hotels & Studios
primaryMaterial: Solid / engineered wood frame with premium velvet upholstery
shortIntro: Designed for refined interiors, the Florence Luxe Armchair blends sculpted elegance with plush comfort. A statement lounge chair crafted for luxury homes, hotels and curated spaces.

children.text: Experience refined comfort with the Aroha House Florence Luxe Armchair — a luxury single-seater lounge chair crafted for modern homes, boutique cafés, hospitality suites and design-led interiors across India.

Its sculpted silhouette, plush high-density cushioning and handcrafted wooden frame deliver visual presence with everyday usability, making it ideal as a reading chair, accent piece or statement lounge seat.

keyFeatures: Handcrafted solid or engineered wood frame
High-density foam cushions in premium velvet
whyThisProduct: Designed for long-term durability and comfort
Engineered for residential and commercial spaces
Customizable to suit interiors and project needs
careInstructions: Vacuum upholstery regularly with soft brush attachment
Blot spills immediately with clean dry cloth
Professional upholstery cleaning recommended for deep cleaning
Wipe wooden frame with soft damp cloth
Avoid harsh chemicals and excessive moisture
Keep away from direct heat and prolonged sunlight
